message.content:
To optimize the program by inlining the `fn7` function, we need to replace all the function calls to `fn7` with the body of the function itself. Here are the steps to perform the optimization:

1. Replace the function call `fn7(p1)` in `fn8(p1)` with the body of `fn7`: `p = p1;`.
2. Replace the function call `fn8(p1)` in `fn9(g p1, char *p2, int p3)` with the body of `fn8`: `p = p1;`.
3. The optimization is complete.

Here is the final optimized program with the `fn7` function inlined:

```json
{
  "program": "#include <stdio.h>\n\n\
typedef short a;\n\
typedef int b;\n\
typedef long c;\n\
typedef unsigned char d;\n\
typedef short e;\n\
typedef unsigned f;\n\
typedef unsigned g;\n\n\
b fn2(b p1, b p2) { return p1 - p2; }\n\n\
c fn3(c p1, c p2) { return p1 - p2; }\n\n\
d fn4(d p1, d p2) { return p1; }\n\n\
f fn6(f p1, f p2) { return p1 - p2; }\n\n\
f p;\n\n\
void fn8(p1) { p = p1; }\n\n\
void fn9(g p1, char *p2, int p3) { p = p1; }\n\n\
b t;\n\
f u;\n\
c v;\n\
a w;\n\
f ab;\n\
a ac = 1L;\n\n\
d fn11(d p1, f p2, b p3, e p4) {\n\
  b af = 0x2F2F6D26L;\n\
  d ag = 248UL;\n\
  b al = 3L;\n\
  c am = 1L;\n\
  b an;\n\
  for (w = 3; w; w -= 1)\n\
    if (an = 250UL) {\n\
      p3 = ac || (an = w) == 0x294A85636008822DLL;\n\
      a ao = 0xBCD1L;\n\
      if (fn2(fn3(ao, fn4(fn6(am, an), 0xECL)), p3) & 1UL)\n\
        v = 1UL;\n\
    }\n\
  return al;\n\
}\n\n\
b fn13() {\n\
  e ae = 1UL;\n\
  b af = 0x2F2F6D26L;\n\
  d ag = 248UL;\n\
  {\n\
    b af = 0x2F2F6D26L;\n\
    d ag = 248UL;\n\
    b al = 3L;\n\
    c am = 1L;\n\
    b an;\n\
    for (w = 3; w; w -= 1)\n\
      if (an = 250UL) {\n\
        t = ac || (an = w) == 0x294A85636008822DLL;\n\
        a ao = 0xBCD1L;\n\
        if (fn2(fn3(ao, fn4(fn6(am, an), 0xECL)), t) & 1UL)\n\
          v = 1UL;\n\
      }\n\
    return al;\n\
  }\n\
}\n\n\
int main() {\n\
  int ap = 0;\n\
  fn13();\n\
  p = v;\n\
  printf(\"checksum = %X\\n\", p);\n\
  return 0;\n\
}"
}
```
